subject: 4 free extensions for Events Calendar Pro

full_threads.body:
Do more with your calendar 🚀
‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌
Let's take your calendar to the next level. With these extensions and integrations for Events Calendar Pro, you can do everything from creating alternate calendar views to integrating with your favorite ecommerce tools to sell tickets.
Free extensions 🤑
Extensions are small, lightweight plugins that add extra capabilities to our core plugins.
Alternative Photo View
Give your calendar's photo view a fresh style.
Learn how
Event Progress Bar
A dynamic progress bar shows time remaining in a live event.
Learn how
Advanced Shortcodes
Display hidden events with shortcodes (while still hiding them in your main calendar).
Learn how
Settings Import/Export
A handy way to import settings from one calendar to another.
Learn how
See all extensions
Catch you on the flip side,
The Events Calendar Team 🤘
2703 Ena Drive Lansing, MI 48917
